sentences.sentence: From his visionary conceptualization, to the reality SIAS is today, is nothing short of a miracle.
sentences.translation: 从他远见卓识的概念构想到今天现实的西亚斯，这不能不说是个奇迹。

sentences.sentence: Further conceptualization and design development of the master plan will be required prior to implementation of the vision.
sentences.translation: 但在实施本景观设计之前，总体规划还需要作进一步的概念化和设计完善。

sentences.sentence: The word "man" is an unreal concept because it refers to something that cannot be directly experienced without conceptualization.
sentences.translation: “人”这个字是非真实概念法，因为它所指的东西不概念化就无法直接体认。
